name: Meek: DEMO (big screen[640x360])
description:
click on this to play the original meek demo.

and now a copy paste of the instructions(from the meek: demo)

[ READ THIS: If you are stuck on the double jump part, keep moving horizontally, don't wait until you fall back down and then do a double jump, that's not how the game physics work, if you want to learn the code, you can go ahead and see inside by pressing the this button at the top of the description.

 [ ANOTHER MESSAGE: if you sometimes hear a different overworld theme, here is the game from the original track: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/522034803/ (GO PLAY IT) ] Instructions: Left and Right Arrow key - run Up arrow - Jump Down Arrow - Crouch X - Throw/De-attach Hand, Air kick Z - walk, Q- show input display 

 CREDITS: Music And Programming and art by Meek. Feedback From a lot of people   ( thanks if you were one of them ) Want to hear more OST? go to @MeekTheMusicMan, where he post music that he made ( including from the Meek game! ) NOTES: The Bees in the game aren't actual bees, this doesn't count as animal abuse, bees are actually really good bugs that helps the earth's ecosystem also this is a parcour-ish styled game, you basically have to master some stuff in order to win

so yeah bye
